articles.title: Northern Italy shutting down as coronavirus cases surge; three dead - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Northern Italy shutting down as coronavirus cases surge; three dead The Globe and Mail Italy hit by largest coronavirus outbreak outside Asia Guardian News Coronavirus: Venice Carnival closes as Italy imposes lockdown BBC News Italian towns shut down amid clu…
articles.content:
Tourists wear protective face masks at Venice Carnival - the last two days of which, as well as Sunday night's festivities, have been cancelled because of an outbreak of coronavirus.
MANUEL SILVESTRI/Reuters
The alarmingly fast spread of the coronavirus in … [+5562 chars]
